## Properties

| Property              | Attribute   | Description                             | Type      | Default     |
| --------------------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `locale` _(required)_ | `locale`    | The locale to visualize.                | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `showFlag`            | `show-flag` | Whether to show the flag of the region. | `boolean` | `true`      |
